content:
Hello @Grahame Grieve

I downloaded the latest FHIR schema from http://hl7-fhir.github.io/ this morning, and am now seeing the below error when attempting to validate FHIR profile samples.

Please advise on how best to resolve.

....
System ID: C:\Validation Files\claim.xsd
Main validation file: C:\Profile Samples\consultation-note-example.xml
Schema: C:\Validation Files\fhir-all.xsd
Engine name: Xerces
Severity: error
Description: sch-props-correct.2: A schema cannot contain two global components with the same name; this schema contains two occurrences of 'http://hl7.org/fhir,ClaimType-list'.
Start location: 763:40
URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/#sch-props-correct

Description: sch-props-correct.2: A schema cannot contain two global components with the same name; this schema contains two occurrences of 'http://hl7.org/fhir,ClaimType'.
Start location: 767:36
URL: http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/#sch-props-correct
....

Thank you,

Meenaxi
Hi Graham, I validated using the Oxygen XML Editor
